From: Bruce Barket <bMat-
To: 
Cc: 
USANYS Aida Leisenrin 
Subject: Re: Tartaglione questioning 
Date: Mon, 12 Aug 2019 16:03:55 +0000 
Thank you. 
Bruce Barket 
Barket, 
Epstein, Kcaron, Attica & LoTttrco 
Barket Epstein.com 
> On Aug 12, 2019, at 12:01 PM, cza> wrote: 
> Received. Jason and I are not involved in the investigation into Mr. Epstein's death, but 1 will forward your 
email to the AUSAs who are working on that particular investigation. 
> Best, 
> Maurene 
> Assistant United States 
Attorney 
> Southern District of New York 
> 
----Original Message 
> From: Bruce Barket 
<bbarket@barketepstein.com> 
> Sent: Monday,August 12, 2019 7:47 AM 
> To: 
aNIMIE
)'; 
(USANYS) 
; Aida Leisenring 
<aleisenring@barketepstein.com>; tonyricco 
<ton 'cco aol.com>; bkoffsk a snet.net; Michael Bachrach <michael mbachlaw.com>; 
> 
Subject: Tartaglione questioning 
> Good 
morning, 
> Given that there are apparently two (the FBI and the IG) investigations into Mr Epstein's suicide, I am writing 
EFTA00020127

to remind everyone that Mr. Tartaglione should not be questioned by anyone about any matter without my prior 
knowledge and consent. 
> I am not precluding his cooperation with the investigations, but I  want to be sure he is not questioned without 
counsel's knowledge and consent. Feel free to give my contact information to the relevant investigators. 
> Bruce Barket 
> Barket, Epstein, Kearon, Aldea & 
LoTurco 
> Barket Epstein.com 
EFTA00020128
